#summary Other RTMFP libraries.

== Open Source ==

  * [https://github.com/tomkrcha/RealtimeGameLib RealtimeGameLib]  (AS3)<br>Simple library for building multiplayer realtime games using P2P (and Flash Media Server).
  * [http://code.google.com/p/cocoon-p2p/ Cocoon P2P] (AS3)<br>P2P library for ActionScript/Flex/AIR focussed on local IP multicast.
  * [https://github.com/devboy/HydraP2P HydraP2P] (AS3) and [http://www.devboy.org/?s=hydra&submit=+ blog]<br>HydraP2P is an ActionScript 3 library aiming to simplify the peer-to-peer API introduced in Flash Player 10.1.
  * [https://github.com/reyco1/as3mul AS3MUL] (AS3) and [http://multiuser.reyco1.com/blog/ blog]<br>AS3 Multiuser Library.
  * [https://github.com/yicui/BitTube-on-Flash BitTube-on-Flash] (AS3)<br>The brand new BitTube system based on the Adobe RTMFP protocol.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/projectstratosphere/ Project Stratosphere] (AS3)<br>A network platform using Adobe Stratus.
  * [https://github.com/itoz/itoz.jp_RTMFP-serverless-/ RTMFP Serverless] (AS3)<br>Serverless mode RTMFP library.
